description: Complete Elder Futhark (24) rune set with star-chart geometric decoders. Each rune is a geometric shape formed by connecting planetary dots on the ecliptic. The angular relationships between planets at any moment decode which runes are active. Runes ARE star charts — connecting the dots of planetary positions.

runes.name: Fehu
runes.meaning: Wealth, abundance, new beginnings, mobile property
runes.lesson: Tend what you have and let it flow; invest energy where it grows
runes.warning: Clinging, greed, or chasing status over substance

star_chart.description: Two parallel ascending strokes — the horns of cattle reaching upward. Formed when Venus-Jupiter align in ascending sextile (60°).

runes.name: Uruz
runes.meaning: Raw strength, vitality, primal power, the aurochs
runes.lesson: Channel power with purpose and discipline
runes.warning: Force without focus; burnout or stubbornness

star_chart.description: Descending curve from apex — the back of the aurochs. Mars trine Moon (120°).

runes.name: Thurisaz
runes.meaning: Threshold, protection, catalytic force, Thor's hammer
runes.lesson: Pause at the gateway; act consciously and defend your boundaries
runes.warning: Reactivity, picking fights, rash decisions

star_chart.description: A pointed thorn from a vertical — Mars square Saturn (90°), sharp angular collision.

runes.name: Ansuz
runes.meaning: Divine breath, communication, wisdom, Odin's rune
runes.lesson: Listen deeply and speak truth with clarity
runes.warning: Miscommunication, gossip, empty words

star_chart.description: Two branches from a stave — Mercury conjunct Jupiter (0°), divine messages flow.

runes.name: Raidho
runes.meaning: Journey, rhythm, chariot, cosmic order, right action
runes.lesson: Move in step with timing; align choices to purpose
runes.warning: Forcing the pace; drifting without direction

star_chart.description: R-shape with forward lean — Mercury trine Mars (120°), smooth transit.

runes.name: Kenaz
runes.meaning: Torch, illumination, knowledge, controlled fire
runes.lesson: Light the way with wisdom; teach and learn with passion
runes.warning: Arrogance, false knowledge, burning out others

star_chart.description: An opening angle like a flame — Sun sextile Venus (60°), creative fire.

runes.name: Gebo
runes.meaning: Gift, generosity, partnership, sacred exchange, balance
runes.lesson: True wealth flows both ways — give and receive in equilibrium
runes.warning: Obligation disguised as gift; strings attached

star_chart.description: Perfect X — Venus-Jupiter opposition (180°), balanced exchange across the ecliptic.

runes.name: Wunjo
runes.meaning: Joy, bliss, harmony, clan prosperity, tribal wellbeing
runes.lesson: Celebrate alignment; share the harvest of good work
runes.warning: Excessive optimism; ignoring shadows

star_chart.description: A pennant flying from a pole — Jupiter trine Sun (120°), joy radiating.

runes.name: Hagalaz
runes.meaning: Hail, disruption, uncontrolled forces, necessary destruction
runes.lesson: Accept the storm; what breaks was not built to last
runes.warning: Catastrophe, loss through external forces beyond control

star_chart.description: An H with diagonal bar — Uranus square Pluto (90°), cosmic hailstorm.

runes.name: Nauthiz
runes.meaning: Need, constraint, friction, the need-fire, necessity as teacher
runes.lesson: Scarcity reveals what truly matters; endure with purpose
runes.warning: Poverty of spirit; want without willingness to act

star_chart.description: A diagonal crossing a vertical — Saturn conjunct Moon (0°), karmic constraint.

runes.name: Isa
runes.meaning: Ice, stillness, stasis, the frozen moment, standstill
runes.lesson: Be still. Not all action is progress. The ice preserves
runes.warning: Paralysis, being frozen by fear, stagnation

star_chart.description: A single vertical line — Saturn stationary (0° motion), cosmos stands still.

runes.name: Jera
runes.meaning: Year, harvest, cycles, reward for labor, natural timing
runes.lesson: Every season turns; plant in spring, harvest in autumn
runes.warning: Impatience with natural cycles; trying to harvest too early

star_chart.description: Two interlocking angles — Jupiter sextile Saturn (60°), expansion/contraction balanced.

runes.name: Eihwaz
runes.meaning: Yew tree, endurance, death/rebirth axis, Yggdrasil's spine
runes.lesson: Stand firm between worlds; the axis connects all planes
runes.warning: Rigidity, fear of transformation, clinging to dead things

star_chart.description: A vertical zigzag — the world tree spine. Pluto trine Sun (120°), deep transformation.

runes.name: Perthro
runes.meaning: Dice cup, fate, luck, wyrd, the unknown, probability well
runes.lesson: Honor the mystery; not everything can be calculated
runes.warning: Gambling, testing fate recklessly, addiction to chance

star_chart.description: An open cup — Neptune sextile Moon (60°), the probability well opens.

runes.name: Algiz
runes.meaning: Elk sedge, protection, divine shield, higher self connection
runes.lesson: Reach upward for protection; connect to your highest guardian
runes.warning: False security, hidden dangers, taboo violation

star_chart.description: Three branches skyward — Jupiter trine Neptune (120°), divine protection canopy.

runes.name: Sowilo
runes.meaning: Sun, victory, life force, wholeness, illumination
runes.lesson: Follow the light; the sun always returns. Victory is certain
runes.warning: Hubris, too much fire, sunburn of the ego

star_chart.description: A zigzag lightning — Sun conjunct Mars (0°), pure solar fire and warrior victory.

runes.name: Tiwaz
runes.meaning: Tyr's rune, justice, honor, sacrifice, the North Star
runes.lesson: Point true north; sacrifice short-term for long-term honor
runes.warning: Injustice, faithlessness, losing one's guiding star

star_chart.description: An upward arrow — Mars trine Jupiter (120°), warrior and king aligned.

runes.name: Berkano
runes.meaning: Birch, rebirth, fertility, new growth, nurturing
runes.lesson: Nurture the new; tend the tender shoots of beginning
runes.warning: Smothering growth, refusing to let things emerge naturally

star_chart.description: Two rounded bumps on a vertical — Moon trine Venus (120°), feminine nurturing.

runes.name: Ehwaz
runes.meaning: Horse, partnership, trust, movement, twin forces in harmony
runes.lesson: Move with your partner; rider and horse must be one
runes.warning: Mistrust, reckless speed, broken partnerships

star_chart.description: An M of two mirrored angles — Mercury conjunct Venus (0°), twin messengers ride.

runes.name: Mannaz
runes.meaning: Mankind, the self, intelligence, social order, humanity
runes.lesson: Know thyself; the greatest rune is the human being
runes.warning: Self-deception, isolation, manipulation of others

star_chart.description: An M with central cross — Mercury sextile Uranus (60°), mind amplified by cosmic insight.

runes.name: Laguz
runes.meaning: Water, flow, intuition, the unconscious, dreams, lake
runes.lesson: Go with the flow; water finds its own level
runes.warning: Drowning in emotion, being swept away, fear of the depths

star_chart.description: A single leaning line — Moon sextile Neptune (60°), intuition flows.

runes.name: Ingwaz
runes.meaning: The seed, gestation, internal growth, Ing/Freyr, completion
runes.lesson: The seed is planted. Wait. Completion comes from within
runes.warning: Aborting the process early; not trusting the gestation

star_chart.description: A perfect diamond/rhombus — Venus trine Moon (120°), seed crystal geometry.

runes.name: Dagaz
runes.meaning: Day, dawn, breakthrough, awakening, polarity synthesis
runes.lesson: Dawn comes after the darkest hour; breakthrough is imminent
runes.warning: Blinding yourself to shadow; overconfidence at transition

star_chart.description: A bowtie/hourglass — Sun opposition Moon (180°, Full Moon), polarity breaks.

runes.name: Othala
runes.meaning: Ancestral property, inheritance, homeland, sacred enclosure
runes.lesson: Honor your roots; true wealth is what cannot be taken
runes.warning: Clannishness, exclusion, hoarding, loss of inheritance

star_chart.description: A diamond atop a V-base — Saturn trine Venus (120°), ancestral inheritance locked in sacred geometry.
